task.title: How to Dance With a Baby
task.shortdesc: Babies are fun but they don't know how to dance. With some hacks, you can make them dance and have a good time.

ul.li: Baby-friendly music (they generally like Pantera and Metallica)

taskbody.context: You should only dance with babies after they have taken a nap, or they will dance angry.

info.note: Make sure the baby has a clean diaper!
